links.title: Setting Up For a Big Move on Fed News at Jackson Hole
links.description: Setting Up For a Big Move on Fed News at Jackson Hole Late on Friday news hit that the U.S. and China were working on a framework for a trade deal. That helped to boost the indices to finish the week but it has been choppy and inconsistent action for a while.

links.title: The Hacker News on Twitter
links.description: A 16-year-old school boy hacked #Apple Servers-not once, but numerous times-and downloaded 90GB of secure files. Now that's embarrassing! https://t.co/r5zQxVfrne Teen claims to have hacked the company because he is a huge Apple fan and dreams of working there. -by @unix_root
